intro_questions.text: Can you spell your family name, please?

main_questions.text: What do you like to eat?
What is your favorite childhood game?
What do you wish to learn in school?

respond_situations.starter_line: Can you tell me your name?
What do you want to buy?
respond_situations.description: You are in a shop. You want to buy apples.

respond_situations.starter_line: What do you want to buy?
Do you want tea or coffee?
respond_situations.description: You are in a café. You need to choose a drink.

ask_situations.instruction: You are at school. Ask your friend for help with homework.
You want to invite your friends to a birthday party. ..
You are at a shop. Ask the clerk for the price of a shirt.

listening_script.text: First, take two slices of bread. Then, add some cheese. Next, put on lettuce. You can add tomato if you like. Finally, close the sandwich.

questions.question: What do you add after cheese?
When do you close the sandwich?

monologue.topic: Talk about a fun day out

follow_up_questions.question: What did you do on your fun day out?
Where did you go for your fun day?
Who were you with on this day?
Why was it a fun day for you?
